name: Bubble Clicker
description:
Bubble Clicker

Pop bubbles to get experience and populate your own underwater city.
Just tap on the bubble with your finger.
For best experience this game is advised to get played on the smartphone.

The game is developed by the team ToadReload:

  • Andrey Vasilev - Game Designer, Project Manager
  • Maksym Solokha - Developer
  • Zahir Aminov - Developer
  • Marina Grishina - 2d Artist
  • Diana Reshetova - 2d Artist
  • Ekaterina Gorshkova - 2d Artist
  • Kirill Karlson - 2d Artist
  • Alexander Lepikhin - Sound Designer
